example.name: a little artificial?

example.name: passivized
example.text: ``People are looking for an ability *trace* to try and read the market, rather than be manipulated *trace*,'' said Dudley A. Eppel, manager of equity trading at Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.

example.name: all args
example.text: John manipulated Mary into eating a live goldfish.
